name: Shadeless - Endless Color Shades Puzzle Game!
name_original: Shadeless - Endless Color Shades Puzzle Game!
description:
Can your eyes spot the shade? Shadeless takes eye exercises to a extremely fun level!

How incredible can your eyes see? Find the "Shadeless" Circle to prove your skill!

Features:

- Control: Simply tap the shade circle to score.
- The circle will be smaller overtime so please be quick!
- Intuitive Gameplay, Hard to Master! The position of next circle is changing anywhere in the screen, find it & tap it!
- "Shadeless" & "Super Shadeless" Circle will give you great score as a reward of the challenging.
- Play with your favorite colors.
- Compete with friends with Game Center's Leaderboard.
- Tons of fun achievements to collect.
- Great UI Design & Awesome Music by Bensound.com

Super Simple, Insanely Addicting!
